sentences.en: Both sides are willing to make allowances for each other's political sensitivities.
sentences.cn: 双方都愿意体谅彼此的政治敏感问题。

sentences.en: He is always eager for new experiences and ever-willing to experiment.
sentences.cn: 他总是渴望拥有新的经历，而且永远愿意尝试。

sentences.en: He was invariably willing to discuss the possibilities hypothetically.
sentences.cn: 他总是愿意谈论各种假设的可能性。

sentences.en: He was willing to make any sacrifice for peace.
sentences.cn: 他愿意为和平作出任何牺牲。

sentences.en: How much are they willing to pay?
I am willing to admit that I do make mistakes.
sentences.cn: 我愿意承认我确实会犯错。

sentences.en: I am willing to make a trade with you.
I soon had an army of willing helpers.
sentences.cn: 我很快就拥有了一批热心的帮手。

sentences.en: I wasn't willing to accept that her leaving was a possibility.
sentences.cn: 我不愿接受她有可能离开的事实。

sentences.en: If you're not willing to help me, I'll find somebody who will.
sentences.cn: 如果你不愿意帮我，我会去找别人。

sentences.en: Lorna found that people were willing to open up to her.
sentences.cn: 洛娜发现人们愿意对她畅所欲言。

sentences.en: Not surprisingly, isolationists found thousands of willing recruits to their cause.
sentences.cn: 不足为奇的是，孤立主义者发现有成千上万的人自愿加入到他们的事业当中来。

sentences.en: The company was willing to drag out the proceedings for years.
sentences.cn: 公司愿意将诉讼拖上几年。

sentences.en: They are willing to sign away their entire worldly possessions.
sentences.cn: 他们愿意签字放弃所有财产。

sentences.en: They were willing to serve the fatherland in its hour of need.
sentences.cn: 他们愿意在祖国需要的时候为她效力。

sentences.en: We are willing to authorize the president to use force if necessary.
sentences.cn: 我们愿意授权总统在必要的时候使用武力。

sentences.en: Young workers are more willing to desert jobs they don't like.
sentences.cn: 年轻职工对不喜欢的工作更易擅自离职。

words.tran_cn: 意志；情感；遗嘱；意图；心愿
乐意；心甘情愿；自动自发
决心要；遗赠；用意志力使

phrases.tran_cn: 心甘情愿努力干活的人

trans.tran_cn: 愿意的，乐意的，自愿的，积极肯干的
trans.tran_en: prepared to do something, or having no reason to not want to do it

trans.tran_cn: 决心；用意志力驱使；将（财产等）遗赠某人（will的现在分词）
